title: My Experience
body: My professional journey has allowed me to work on diverse projects across UI/UX design and Frontend development. I’ve collaborated with teams to create responsive, user-centered, and visually appealing web applications using modern technologies.

uiuxIntern.title: UI/UX Design Intern – Tavant Technologies, Bangalore
uiuxIntern.description: Worked closely with the design and development teams to create interactive, user-friendly interfaces. Gained hands-on experience in wireframing, prototyping, and implementing UI components that enhance user engagement.

frontendViprata.title: Frontend Developer – Viprata Technologies, Hyderabad
frontendViprata.description: Developed responsive web interfaces using React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Collaborated on dynamic projects focusing on performance optimization, clean UI design, and seamless user experience.

frontendGlobalConnect.title: Frontend Developer – Global Connect Business Solutions, Hyderabad
frontendGlobalConnect.description: Building and maintaining scalable frontend applications with modern frameworks. Responsible for integrating APIs, implementing reusable components, and ensuring high-quality, accessible design across devices.
